components.description:
A yellow face placing an index finger over pursed lips, as if issuing Shh! or Shush! for silence. Some platforms feature raised eyebrows. Apple’s design suggests the face is tilting back slightly. 

May convey silence, quiet, secrecy, and discreetness. May also create a sense of buzz and anticipation, e.g., an exclusive sneak peek or news scoop.

See also ü§ê Zipper-Mouth Face. Joins ü§ó Hugging Face, ü§î Thinking Face, and ü§≠ Face With Hand Over Mouth as one of the few smileys featuring hands.
components.title: Face with Finger Covering Closed Lips

title: Face with Finger Covering Closed Lips

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

  • üòÉ Emoji 5.0 list
  • üî£ Unicode 10.0.0 Specification
